Package com.example.foodpanda.service

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
com.example.foodpanda.service.OrderService
@Service public class OrderService extends Object
Order Service Handles all the order related operations

    • OrderService

      @Autowired public OrderService(OrderRepository orderRepository, FoodService foodService, RestaurantService restaurantService)
      Instantiates a new Order service.
      Parameters:
      orderRepository - the order repository
      foodService - the food service
      restaurantService - the restaurant service

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public List<Order> findAll()
      Find all orders.
      Returns:
      a list containing all the orders

    • createOrderFromFoodId

      public void createOrderFromFoodId(OrderDTO orderDTO, User user)
      Create a new order knowing the user and the foods he ordered.
      Parameters:
      orderDTO - Data transfer object containing information about the ordered food
      user - the user we want to create the order for
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user or the food is not found

    • findById

      public Order findById(int id)
      Find order by id
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the order
      Returns:
      the order with the given id

    • denyOrder

      public Order denyOrder(int id, Restaurant restaurant)
      Deny an order (changes the status of the order to DECLINED)
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the order we want to decline
      restaurant - the restaurant that has the specified order
      Returns:
      the order with the modified status (also saved in the database)

    • nextStatus

      public Order nextStatus(int id, Restaurant restaurant)
      Changes the status of the order to a new one based on the following order PENDING -> ACCEPTED, ACCEPTED -> IN DELIVERY, IN DELIVERY -> DELIVERED
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the order we want to change the status of
      restaurant - the restaurant that has the specified order
      Returns:
      the order with the modified status (also saved in the database)
